location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Material: Blue-print with additions in pencil.Dimensions: 300 x 180mm, on sheet 330 x 210mm.

mods.abstract: The plan shows Fasht ad Dibal with a proposed site and a proposed landing place. The plan was published as Appendix 9 to a Report by David W. Hood, Supplementary to that of a Committee of Enquiry on the Lighting and Buoyage of the Persian Gulf.
